function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of security testing and protocols leading to unauthorized breaches","Impact":"Compromised data, system downtime, loss of trust","Mitigation":"Implement regular security testing, update protocols, and enforce strict access controls","Technologies":"Security testing tools, encryption, access control systems","People":"End users, organization stakeholders","Owner":"IT department"},{"Description":"Inadequate device management leading to system inefficiency","Impact":"Reduced productivity, system downtime, increased vulnerability to malware","Mitigation":"Implement device management tools, enforce regular maintenance and updates, educate end users","Technologies":"Device management software, remote monitoring tools, user education platforms","People":"End users, IT department","Owner":"IT department"},{"Description":"Poor maintenance of networking equipment leading to connectivity issues","Impact":"Disruption of business operations, decreased efficiency, loss of communication","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance schedules, proper setup and configuration, backup systems","Technologies":"Networking monitoring tools, backup systems, remote maintenance tools","People":"End users, IT department, IT infrastructure stakeholders","Owner":"IT department"}]}
